data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Constantine access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Constantine, Algeria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 938,500 citizens of Constantine, Algeria, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Constantine against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 640 believers in Constantine, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bedouin, Tajakant people.
Spirit, teach the 640 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 640 believers in Constantine, Algeria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Constantine, Algeria need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
